title: LoL vs PUBG ?
body: We all know how hectic is LoL but we still love this game but season 8 will kill the fun ,idk about you guys but currently i am having fun in PUBG Compare to League, i  just want your opinion from those who are playing both games. My vote goes to PUBG as its more fun

replies.body: I don't play lol anymore. I enjoy pubg more personally.
When are you gonna carry me to a win? ðŸ‘

in a korean point, i personal prefer league more than pubg, but tbh pubg is better than league, because i ge bored on league so easily but never pubg, but i played league for more than 3 years {{item:3340}} {{summoner:7}} {{champion:238}}
Pubg is an overrated trash H1Z1 rip-off.

> [{quoted}](name=Azirious Mistake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5BP0AMdn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-10T21:00:28.654+0000)
>
> Pubg is an overrated trash H1Z1 rip-off.

Uh, it has the same Director behind it, Brendan Greene, who has stated in the past that Pubg is what he originally wanted H1Z1 to be.
your going to enjoy a new game more than one you've been playing for years though
